description.para: Helpers for spawning ammo/magazine in weapon For the flags, either a combination of WeaponWithAmmoFlags can be used Or one of the preset 'const int' with 'SAMF_' prefix (SAMF_DEFAULT, SAMF_RNG)

briefdescription.para: General method trying to attch magazine, fill inner magazine and fill chamber.

parameterdescription.para: string The magazine to attach or ammo to load, passing in empty string will select random
int Setup flags, please read WeaponWithAmmoFlags

simplesect.para: whether anything was spawned or done

briefdescription.para: Try to spawn and attach a magazine.

parameterdescription.para: string The magazine to attach, passing in empty string will select random
int Setup flags, please read WeaponWithAmmoFlags

briefdescription.para: Try to fill the inner magazine.

parameterdescription.para: string The ammo to load, passing in empty string will select random

simplesect.para: It is best to fill in the actual 'ammo', as in the ones usually prefixed by 'Bullet_', to skip searching for it

parameterdescription.para: int Setup flags, please read WeaponWithAmmoFlags

simplesect.para: Whether any ammo was added to the gun or not

briefdescription.para: Try to fill the chamber.

parameterdescription.para: string The ammo to load, passing in empty string will select random

simplesect.para: It is best to fill in the actual 'ammo', as in the ones usually prefixed by 'Bullet_', to skip searching for it

parameterdescription.para: int Setup flags, please read WeaponWithAmmoFlags

briefdescription.para: Returns number of slots for attachments corrected for weapons.
Initializes DOF properties for weapon's ironsight/optics cameras.
gets weapon length from config for weaponlift raycast

inbodydescription.para: snippet below measures distance from "RightHandIndex1" bone for lifting calibration

memberdef.argsstring: (int muzzleIndex, out float ammoDamage, out string ammoTypeName)
memberdef.name: EjectCartridge

briefdescription.para: unload bullet from chamber or internal magazine

parameterdescription.para: type name of the ejected ammo

simplesect.para: true if bullet removed from chamber

briefdescription.para: attachment helpers (firearm melee)
Create weapon with ammo.

parameterdescription.para: string The magazine to attach or ammo to load, passing in empty string will select random
int Setup flags, please read WeaponWithAmmoFlags

briefdescription.para: Full highest capacity magazine + chambered round.
Random bullet quantity + maybe chambered round.
weapon abilities
weapon state machine
animation state the weapon is in, -1 == uninitialized

memberdef.name: hit_mask
memberdef.initializer: = PhxInteractionLayers.CHARACTER | PhxInteractionLayers.BUILDING | PhxInteractionLayers.DOOR | PhxInteractionLayers.VEHICLE | PhxInteractionLayers.ROADWAY | PhxInteractionLayers.TERRAIN | PhxInteractionLayers.ITEM_SMALL | PhxInteractionLayers.ITEM_LARGE | PhxInteractionLayers.FENCE | PhxInteractionLayers.AI

briefdescription.para: override on weapons with some assembly required
query if weapon supports action and actionType

simplesect.para: true if weapon has running fsm

briefdescription.para: returns currently active state

simplesect.para: current state the FSM is in (or NULL)

briefdescription.para: returns true if state machine started playing action/actionType and waits for finish
weapon's fsm handling of events @NOTE: warning: ProcessWeaponEvent can be called only within DayZPlayer::HandleWeapons (or CommandHandler)

detaileddescription.para: @NOTE: warning: ProcessWeaponEvent can be called only within DayZPlayer::HandleWeapons (or CommandHandler)

briefdescription.para: tries to return identifier of current stable state (or nearest stable state if unstable state is currently running)
With the parameters given, selects a random suitable state for the FSM of the weapon @WARNING: Weapon_Base.Synchronize call might be needed, if this method is called while clients are connected.
Helper method for RandomizeFSMState.
Returns number of slots for attachments corrected for weapons.
script counterpart to engine's class Weapon
